COMMAND.NAME: savebufferto
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Save a copy of bufferName to newPath. The buffer is not renamed.
COMMAND.STATUS: bufferName will return an error if the save can not be completed.

This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
